name: Antelink
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Antelink is an IPC camera, you can securely monitor your home by using APP on smartphone or web on PC.

Now, with the skill Antelink you can play the stream by voice

HOW TO GET CONNECTED:
1. Search the "Antelink" skill on Alexa app
2. Tap the 'Enable' button
3. Enter your Antelink account and password to link your Antelink account
4. Select a camera to bind
5.After your Antelink account has been successfully linked. Talk to your Echo and say, "Alexa, show camera".

TIPS: To use this skill, you need to specify the name and password of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the Antelink App.

LIST OF COMMANDS:
- Alexa, show camera
